revisionDesc.change: Added the @xml:lang attribute to all nodes that lacked this attribute. The value is based on the closest ancestor.

Improved person nodes with persName type="noAddName" and persName type="flattened" children and by querying VIAF for those with VIAF IDs, adding birth, death, and idno.
Improved persName, surname and forename nodes by automatically marking up Arabic name components, such as nasab, nisba, khitab, kunya.
Improved persName, surname and forename nodes by automatically marking up Arabic name components, such as nasab, nisba, khitab, kunya.
Corrected validation errors. The file still contains duplicate names
Improved person nodes that had references to VIAF, by querying VIAF and adding birth , death , and idno .
